abilities.name: THE TRIBUNI
abilities.description: During setup, choose an unplayed faction from among the Mentak, the Xxcha and The Argent Flight; take that faction's home system, command tokens and control markers. Additionally, take the Keleres Hero that corresponds to that faction.

abilities.name: COUNCIL PATRONAGE
abilities.description: Replenish your commodities at the start of the strategy phase, then gain 1 trade good.

abilities.name: LAW'S ORDER
abilities.description: You may spend 1 influence at the start of your turn to treat all laws as blank until the end of your turn.

flagship.name: Artemiris
abilities: Other players must spend 2 influence to activate the system that contains this ship.

mech.name: Omniopiares
abilities: Other players must spend 1 influence to commit ground forces to the planet that contains this unit.

homeSystem.note: Takes home system from chosen faction (Mentak, Xxcha, or Argent Flight)

base.name: Keleres Rider
base.effect: After an agenda is revealed: You cannot vote on this agenda. Predict aloud an outcome of this agenda. If your prediction is correct, draw 1 action card and gain 2 trade goods. Then, return this card to the Keleres player.
base.returnCondition: Then, return this card to the Keleres player.

base.name: Xander Alexin Victori III
base.ability: At any time: You may exhaust this card to allow any player to spend commodities as if they were trade goods.

base.name: Suffi An
base.unlockCondition: Spend 1 trade good after you play an action card that has a component action
base.ability: After you perform a component action: You may perform an additional action.

base.name: Kuuasi Aun Jalatai (Argent)
base.ability: At the start of a round of space combat in a system that contains a planet you control: Place your flagship and up to a total of 2 cruisers and/or destroyers from your reinforcements in the active system. Then, purge this card.

alternates.name: Odlynn Myrr (Xxcha)
alternates.ability: After an agenda is revealed: You may cast up to 6 additional votes on this agenda. Predict aloud an outcome for this agenda. For each player that votes for another outcome, gain 1 trade good and 1 command token. Then, purge this card.

alternates.name: Harka Leeds (Mentak)
alternates.ability: ACTION: Reveal cards from the action card deck until you reveal 3 action cards that have component actions. Draw those cards and shuffle the rest back into the action card deck. Then, purge this card.
